repeatContactSuccess: You have successfully reminded about discord =)
repeatContactNotSuccess: Error, the victim has already specified discord {Blue}{DISCORD}
playerSuccessfulCheck: You have successfully passed the check, have a nice game =)
adminSuccessfulCheck: You have successfully completed the check =)
adminCalledOnCheck: Administrator {LightRed}{ADMIN_NAME}{Default} has called player {Grey}{TARGET_NAME} {Default}for a check
targetDisconnected: Player {Grey}{TARGET_NAME} {DEFAULT}has left the server and was automatically banned, check completed
targetNullDiscord: Player failed to specify discord and was automatically banned, check completed
successContactTarget: You have successfully specified discord, waiting for admin's call
nullArgsContact:
Error, you didn't specify discord. 
Enter!contact {LightRed}your_discord {Default}(example:!contact CYBERC4T)
switchTeamUnAvailableInCheck: Error, you cannot switch teams because you are on a check =(
targetNull: Error, the selected player is absent =(
playerOnCheck: Error, the player is already on a check
moveSpecSuccess: You have moved the victim to spectators
moveSpecNotSuccess: Error, the victim is already in spectators
playSoundSuccess: The sound has been played for the victim
addTimeSuccess:
You have successfully added +{TIME} seconds for discord input
Remaining - {MIN} min {SEC} sec
textForPlayer:
Enter your discord using !contact your_discord

You have {MIN} min {SEC} sec left
To provide discord
textForAdmin: The victim has {MIN} min {SEC} sec left
